ARABIC: وَإِنِّى عُذْتُ بِرَبِّى وَرَبِّكُمْ أَن تَرْجُمُونِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I have sought refuge with my Lord and your Lord against your stoning me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I have taken refuge in my Lord and your Lord against your stoning me to death.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: I have taken refuge with my Lord and your Lord lest you should attack me with stones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I seek protection from my Lord and your Lord from your decision of stoning me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And I take the refuge of my Lord and yours, against your stoning me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And truly, I seek refuge with my Lord and your Lord, lest you should stone me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And surely I take refuge with my Lord and your Lord that you should stone me to death:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and I take refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you should stone me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord lest ye stone me to death.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: I have sought refuge with my Lord and your Lord lest you stone me [to death].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord lest ye stone me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: I seek the protection of my Lord and your Lord, lest you should stone me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For me, I have sought safety with my Lord and your Lord, against your injuring me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And truly, I seek refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you stone me (or call me a sorcerer or kill me).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: I take refuge with my Lord and your Lord lest you stone me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: I have taken refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you stone me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you stone me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:20] So he said, ‘And truly I seek refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you should stone me, [to death] with rocks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord lest ye stone me to death) lest you kill me.
